radiation.documentation: Radiation emitted by the plasma and neutrals

radiation.code.documentation: Generic decription of the code-specific parameters for the code that has produced this IDS

radiation.code.output_flag.documentation: Output flag : 0 means the run is successful, other values mean some difficulty has been encountered, the exact meaning is then code specific. Negative values mean the result shall not be used.

radiation.code.parameters.documentation: List of the code specific parameters in XML format

radiation.ids_properties.documentation: Interface Data Structure properties. This element identifies the node above as an IDS

radiation.ids_properties.comment.documentation: Any comment describing the content of this IDS

radiation.ids_properties.creation_date.documentation: Date at which this data has been produced

radiation.ids_properties.homogeneous_tim.documentation: 1 if the time of this IDS is homogeneous. In this case, the time values for this IDS are stored in ../time just below the root of this IDS. Otherwise, the time values are stored in the various time fields at lower levels in the tree.

radiation.ids_properties.provider.documentation: Name of the person in charge of producing this data

radiation.ids_properties.source.documentation: Source of the data (any comment describing the origin of the data : code, path to diagnostic signals, processing method, ...)

radiation.process.documentation:
Set of emission processes. The radiation characteristics are described at the level of the originating entity:
1/ line radiation from neutrals under neutral 2/ line and recombination radiation under ion 3/ bremsstrahlung radiation under neutral and ion 4/ possibly recombination and bremsstrahlung under ion

radiation.process[:].global_quantities[:.documentation: Emissions from the core plasma, inside the last closed flux surface
Total power emitted by all species
Index in the error_description list for "power_electrons"
Index in the error_description list for "power"
Total power emitted by all ion species
Index in the error_description list for "power_ion_total"
Total power emitted by all neutral species
Index in the error_description list for "power_neutral_total"
Total emissions inside the vacuum vessel
Total power emitted by all species
Index in the error_description list for "power_electrons"
Index in the error_description list for "power"
Total power emitted by all ion species
Index in the error_description list for "power_ion_total"
Total power emitted by all neutral species
Index in the error_description list for "power_neutral_total"

radiation.process[:].identifier.index.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list)

radiation.process[:].profiles_1d.documentation: Emissivity radial profiles for various time slices

radiation.process[:].profiles_1d[:].elec.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "emissivity"
Radiated power from inside the flux surface (volume integral of the emissivity inside the flux surface)
Index in the error_description list for "power_inside"

radiation.process[:].profiles_1d[:].emis.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "emissivity_ion_total"
Index in the error_description list for "emissivity_neutral_total"

radiation.process[:].profiles_1d[:].grid.documentation: Cross-sectional area of the flux surface
Index in the error_description list for "area"
Index in the error_description list for "psi"
Toroidal flux coordinate. rho_tor = sqrt(b_flux_tor/(pi*b0)) ~ sqrt(pi*r^2*b0/(pi*b0)) ~ r [m]. The toroidal field used in its definition is indicated under vacuum_toroidal_field/b0
Index in the error_description list for "rho_tor"

Normalised toroidal flux coordinate. The normalizing value for rho_tor_norm, is the toroidal flux coordinate at the equilibrium boundary (LCFS or 99.x % of the LCFS in case of a fixed boundary equilibium calculation, see time_slice/boundary/b_flux_pol_norm in the equilibrium IDS)
Index in the error_description list for "rho_tor_norm"
Volume enclosed inside the magnetic surface
Index in the error_description list for "volume"

radiation.process[:].profiles_1d[:].ion.documentation: Process terms related to the different ions species

radiation.process[:].profiles_1d[:].ion[.documentation: List of elements forming the atom or molecule
Index in the error_description list for "a"
Number of atoms of this element in the molecule
Index in the error_description list for "multiplicity"
Index in the error_description list for "z_n"
Index in the error_description list for "emissivity"
String identifying ion (e.g. H+, D+, T+, He+2, C+, ...)
Multiple states calculation flag : 0-Only one state is considered; 1-Multiple states are considered and are described in the state structure
Index of the corresponding neutral species in the ../../neutral array
Radiated power from inside the flux surface (volume integral of the emissivity inside the flux surface)
Index in the error_description list for "power_inside"
Process terms related to the different charge states of the species (ionisation, energy, excitation, ...)
Configuration of atomic orbitals of this state, e.g. 1s2-2s1
Index in the error_description list for "emissivity"
Flag specifying if this state corresponds to a neutral (1) or not (0)
String identifying charge state (e.g. C+, C+2 , C+3, C+4, C+5, C+6, ...)
Neutral type (if the considered state is a neutral), in terms of energy. ID =1: cold; 2: thermal; 3: fast; 4: NBI
Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list)
Radiated power from inside the flux surface (volume integral of the emissivity inside the flux surface)
Index in the error_description list for "power_inside"
Index in the error_description list for "vibrational_level"
Vibrational mode of this state, e.g. "A_g". Need to define, or adopt a standard nomenclature.
Maximum Z of the charge state bundle
Index in the error_description list for "z_max"
Minimum Z of the charge state bundle
Index in the error_description list for "z_min"
Ion charge (of the dominant ionisation state; lumped ions are allowed)
Index in the error_description list for "z_ion"

Process terms related to the different charge states of the species (energy, excitation, ...)
Configuration of atomic orbitals of this state, e.g. 1s2-2s1
Index in the error_description list for "emissivity"
Neutral type (if the considered state is a neutral), in terms of energy. ID =1: cold; 2: thermal; 3: fast; 4: NBI

radiation.process[:].profiles_1d[:].powe.documentation: Total power from ion species (summed over ion  species) inside the flux surface (volume integral of the emissivity inside the flux surface)
Index in the error_description list for "power_inside_ion_total"
Total power from ion species (summed over neutral species) inside the flux surface (volume integral of the emissivity inside the flux surface)
Index in the error_description list for "power_inside_neutral_total"

radiation.vacuum_toroidal_field.documentation: Characteristics of the vacuum toroidal field (used in rho_tor definition)

radiation.vacuum_toroidal_field.b0.documentation: Vacuum toroidal field at R0 [T]; Positive sign means anti-clockwise when viewing from above. The product R0B0 must be consistent with the b_tor_vacuum_r field of the tf IDS.

radiation.vacuum_toroidal_field.b0_error.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "b0"

radiation.vacuum_toroidal_field.r0.documentation: Reference major radius where the vacuum toroidal magnetic field is given (usually a fixed position such as the middle of the vessel at the equatorial midplane)

radiation.vacuum_toroidal_field.r0_error.documentation: Index in the error_description list for "r0"
